casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ardie DeFronso NOLON. No. 59P97-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of July 2007 by Defendant for "Request For A Special Judge":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
